dc_title_s: Appletons' railway map of the United States and the Canadas : representing railways in actual operation, and those in course of construction, also map of the territories, showing the Pacific Railroad, gold regions, &c.
dc_description_s: Relief shown by hachures.; Prime meridian: Washington, D.C.; Inset: [Western United States].; Advertisements and ancillary map: Map of Illinois Central Railway and connections, on verso.|54 x 69 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:3,600,000|General Map Collection
